Our values continue to guide us, allowing SIMS Nigeria Limited to thrive in a constantly evolving market while delivering lasting value to our customers, partners, and people across Nigeria. With premium products and unmatched service, we are honored to represent these trusted brands in Nigeria, bringing innovation and quality products directly to our customers with the sole aim of enriching their lives. As we continue to expand and adapt to meet the growing needs of our market, SIMS Nigeria Limited remains committed to setting the standard in product quality and service across the nation.

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Store Officer is responsible for the efficient and accurate receipt, storage, and dispatch of goods within the warehouse. This role involves overseeing inventory control, maintaining accurate records, and ensuring the security and safety of all stock.


Key Responsibilities


	Receiving and Inspecting Goods
	Warehousing and Storage:
	Inventory Control
	Order Fulfillment
	Warehouse Security
	Record Keeping.

	1-3 years of relevant experience.
	NYSC Certificate.
	Proficiency in inventory management systems and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Attention to detail and accuracy.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Female preferred for gender balance.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;employment@simsng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position &amp; Preferred Location as the subject of the email.",

Store Officer Job at SIMS Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        SIMS Nigeria Limited - For over three decades, SIMS Nigeria Limited has grown from a single store to a nationwide business in the consumer electronics space with locations across Nigeria. Our journey of consistent growth and dedication has been driven by a commitment to quality in every aspect of our business. From our highly skilled and well-informed staff to the innovations and processes we bring to bear to ensure each customer receives top-tier service and dependable products.
     

            
    



With pride, we believe we are on a journey to building a legacy rooted in trust, innovation, and exceptional standards riding on our partnership with Samsung, Royal Electronics, Panasonic, Philips, Beko, Kenwood, Powermatic, and many others. Our values continue to guide us, allowing SIMS Nigeria Limited to thrive in a constantly evolving market while delivering lasting value to our customers, partners, and people across Nigeria. With premium products and unmatched service, we are honored to represent these trusted brands in Nigeria, bringing innovation and quality products directly to our customers with the sole aim of enriching their lives. As we continue to expand and adapt to meet the growing needs of our market, SIMS Nigeria Limited remains committed to setting the standard in product quality and service across the nation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Store Officer
Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Store Officer is responsible for the efficient and accurate receipt, storage, and dispatch of goods within the warehouse. This role involves overseeing inventory control, maintaining accurate records, and ensuring the security and safety of all stock.


Key Responsibilities


	Receiving and Inspecting Goods
	Warehousing and Storage:
	Inventory Control
	Order Fulfillment
	Warehouse Security
	Record Keeping.


Qualifications


	BSc. or equivalent certificate in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
	1-3 years of relevant experience.
	NYSC Certificate.
	Proficiency in inventory management systems and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Attention to detail and accuracy.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Female preferred for gender balance.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: employment@simsng.com using the Job Position & Preferred Location as the subject of the email.

Lounge Admin Job at Chilis Restaurants




        
    

        
        Chilis Restaurants is a contemporary African restaurant that offers a wide variety of meals that delivers an original taste of homemade meals while prioritizing health hygiene. it is a 24-hours restaurant with good quality of food and good services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Lounge Admin

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Greet members and visitors warmly, creating a welcoming atmosphere.
	Handle phone calls, emails, and in-person inquiries professionally.
	Manage bookings, check-ins, and special requests.
	Address guest complaints and resolve conflicts calmly.
	Oversee daily operations for cleanliness, comfort, and efficiency.
	Manage inventory, supplies, and ordering.
	Process payments, manage billing, and handle financial records.
	Coordinate with catering and other service providers.
	Organize meetings, take minutes, and manage agendas/travel.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and maintain digital/paper records.
	Promote and organize special events.
	Liaise with other departments (finance, marketing) and management.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chilisrestaurant.ibadan@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Must have experience in the Lounge Business
	Proximity to Governor's Road, Ikotun is preferred.
